definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: hurt, injury, pain;—[[עַצָָּבֶת]] Pr 10:10 he that winketh with the eye causeth hurt (stirs up strife, etc.); cstr. [[עַצְּבַת־לֵב]] pain of heart Pr 15:13 (opp. [[לֵב שָׂמֵחַ]]); pl. sf. [[עַצְּבׂתָ֫י]] Job 9:28 my pains, so rd. perh. also Job 7:15 (for MT [[עַחְמוֹתָ֫י]]); [[עַצְּבוֹתָם]] Ps 16:4 (due to idolatry; > idols Targum Vulgate We al.); ´[[מְחַבֵּשׁ לְע]] Ps 147:3 binding up their hurts.
